definitions: the practice or occupation of working as a prostitute

examples.text: she had not gone back to whoring

definitions: the action of using the services of prostitutes

examples.text: he frequently upsets his lovely wife with his whoring and drinking

shortDefinitions: action of using services of prostitutes

definitions: the unworthy or corrupt use of one's talents for personal or financial gain

examples.text: thanks to my daily corporate whoring, I can afford the money

shortDefinitions: unworthy use of one's talents for financial gain
